name: skeyes
goal: skeyes is an autonomous public company in charge of the safety of air traffic in the civil airspace for which the Belgian State is responsible. skeyes provides all the essential services to manage and control the air traffic safely up to flight level 245 (24,500 feet or 7.5 km). In addition, skeyes provides air traffic services to the airports of Brussels, Charleroi, Liege, Antwerp and Ostend.
interests: Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Framework Regulation 549/2004 establishing the Single European Sky
Service Provision Regulation 550/2004
Airspace Regulation 551/2004
Regulation (EU)2018/1139 establishing a European Union Aviation Safety Agency
Aviation Strategy
Airspace Architecture Study
